name: student-site-boilerplate
description: A modern boilerplate for static website development, based on https://staticsiteboilerplate.com/

scripts.lint:html:
echo "Validating your HTML..." && html-validate --config .htmlvalidate.json --formatter @profkexplains/htmlvalidate "src" && chalk green --no-stdin "✓ No errors found in your HTML

"
scripts.lint:js:
echo "Starting ESLint..." && eslint "src/**/*.js" -f ./config/formatter.eslint.js && chalk green --no-stdin "✓ No errors found in your JavaScript

"
scripts.lint:styles:
echo "Starting Stylelint..." && stylelint "src/**/*.css" --custom-formatter ./config/formatter.stylelint.js && chalk green --no-stdin "✓ No errors found in your CSS

"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:html && npm run lint:styles && npm run lint:js
scripts.fix:
eslint --fix "src/**/*.js" -f ./config/formatter.eslint.js && chalk green --no-stdin "✓ Attempted to automatically fix JavaScript errors
" && stylelint --fix "src/**/*.css" && chalk green --no-stdin "✓ Attempted to automatically fix CSS errors
" && echo "
All set! Run 'npm run lint' to check for errors 
that need to be fixed manually.
"
scripts.test: npm run lint && echo "Checking assignment requirements..." && jest && chalk green --no-stdin "✓ All tests passed. Nice work!"
